mapper.insert: insert into rcm_project_relation (id, business_id, project_no, user_id, user_name, relation_type, create_time, type) values( #{id},#{businessId},#{projectNo},#{userId},#{userName},#{relationType},sysdate,#{type})
mapper.delete: delete from rcm_project_relation t where t.business_id=#{businessId} and t.relation_type=#{relationType}
